# free

**Instance Method**

Performs any final cleanup for the action object.

## Declaration

```swift
void free();
```

## Configuring the Action

- **SetAbortedHandler**: Install a handler for the system to call when no other processes reference the action object.

items.description: Install a handler for the system to call when no other processes reference the action object.
items.name: SetAbortedHandler
